name: Makeup Repair
description:
Fixing and repairing your broken cosmetics haven’t been this much fun!

Repair the broken powders, blushes, counter palettes, eyeshadows and much more in this game.

DIY your own make-up products and create amazing make-up looks. Let’s craft beautiful cosmetics and show your creativity!
publishers: RUBY OYUN VE YAZILIM DANISMANLIK SANAYI TICARET LIMITED SIRKETI
